name: Tbutler-inc
tagline: A butlering service using only the latest ComputerCraft technology.
body:
# Welcome to TButler Incorporated.

Our job is to make your life simpler. You would like that wouldn't you? Yes, I can see it in your eyes. Well, what if I told you that I could do this for free? Ah! You look anxious to get started! Well, before I can do that, I am afraid I must continue training our employees, I only want the BEST performance. So, I'll talk to you later. I need to get cracking!  

Current things we are learning:  
"A turtle should be neither be seen nor heard." (Pathfinding)  
"Listen and understand what is required of you." (Smart commands)

TButler Incorporated is owned by Csstform. All rights reserved. Copyright 2014.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
